TopicTitle: Whenever I launch a ship, the launch stand wont hold up the ship (no matter the size)

Articles.Content:
For some reason the launch stand won't hold my rockets.This started since the last update.

Is anyone else having this problem?
Are you using more than 1 launch clamp? Are you even using launch clamps?
A picture would be really helpful to get an idea what the problem is.

Are you using more than 1 launch clamp? Are you even using launch clamps?

I'm using 3 to 4 at times.

Just how big is this rocket?

I've had it happen with 1 part, and it happen with 100 parts. It seems like the launch clamps aren't holding the rocket

Screenshots of before and after would be very helpful.

=Smidge=
I've seen that as an occasional glitch. I wonder: does it only happen with designs you copied over from previous versions? That's when I saw it.

Are u using many mods?

If not just back up your savegamfolder and reinsall should be the fastes solution instead figuring out whats causing the problem
